alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 2:58PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Winds up to 55 mph will impact portions of southeastern Blaine, northwestern Bannock, southeastern Butte, western Power, southwestern Bingham, northeastern Cassia and northeastern Minidoka Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 256 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary extending from 25 miles south of Craters Of The Moon to near Minidoka to Albion. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated and mesonet observations. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... American Falls, Neeley, Lake Walcott, American Falls Reservoir, Aberdeen, Rockland, Albion, Minidoka, Cold Water Rest Area, Southwest Inl, Springfield, Sterling, Yale Rest Area, Massacre Rocks, Big Southern Butte, Mt Harrison, Bear Trap Airport, Pilar Butte, Coxs Well Airport and Idahome. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Winds along this boundary may strengthen, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Eastern Magic Valley; Lower Snake River Plain; Marsh and Arbon Highlands; Raft River Region; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
